feed.title: Live Blog Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Live Blog: v3.90.2
entry.content:
Added

  • Create Go pricing plan notification for bandwidth usage

Fixed

  • Fix deleted post issue in Classic Theme
  • Remove usages of notify.pop as it no longer exists

Full Changelog: https://github.com/liveblog/liveblog/compare/v3.90.1...v3.90.2

entry.title: New release for Live Blog: v3.90.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [LBSD-2903] - Resolve error when deleting comments before publishing by @BrianMwangi21 in https://github.com/liveblog/liveblog/pull/1422

Full Changelog: https://github.com/liveblog/liveblog/compare/v3.90.2...v3.90.3

entry.title: New release for Live Blog: v3.90.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

Added

  • [LBSD-2916] Frontend accessibility improvements by @eos87 in https://github.com/liveblog/liveblog/pull/1431
  • [LBSD-2909] Strip html tags from LiveblogPostingSchema's articleBody by @eos87 in https://github.com/liveblog/liveblog/pull/1427

Fixed

  • Fix Instance Settings Persistence by @BrianMwangi21 in https://github.com/liveblog/liveblog/pull/1428
  • Continuous integration issues by @eos87

Full Changelog: https://github.com/liveblog/liveblog/compare/v3.90.3...v3.90.4

entry.title: New release for Live Blog: v3.90.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [LBSD-2919] - Fix posts not rendered after load more button is hit by @eos87 in https://github.com/liveblog/liveblog/pull/1436

Full Changelog: https://github.com/liveblog/liveblog/compare/v3.90.4...v3.90.5

entry.title: New release for Live Blog: v3.90.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix load more disappearing on load more and also on shared view by @BrianMwangi21 in https://github.com/liveblog/liveblog/pull/1437
  • Implement SEO and accessibility improvements in theme by @BrianMwangi21 in https://github.com/liveblog/liveblog/pull/1435

Full Changelog: https://github.com/liveblog/liveblog/compare/v3.90.5...v3.90.6
